availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Committee of the provisional government of Kentucky responsible for foreign relations. The Provisional Government and its committees were recognized by the Confederate States of America on December 10, 1861. Chairman: Horatio W. Bruce. Members: George B. Hodge, James Stone Chrisman, and Willis Bruce Machen.

ab.bibl:
Ron D. Bryant, "Confederate State Government" in The Kentucky Encyclopedia, John E. Kleber, ed. (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 1992), 222.
KYR-0004-033-0008.
